Html: It appears as though the v2.2.4 DKDPS model does not take into account the Orc axe specialization.  This is not a huge deal since all you have to do is mentally account for the additional expertise if you have an axe equiped as an Orc, but it would be nice if this could be built right into the model.  I am not technically competent, so I don't know how hard this would be.  I did not check the Human & Dwarf weapon specializations using the model...
It's accounted for in the model, it probably just isn't getting displayed.
You are right.  If I build a new orc DK and equip an axe, expertise goes up by 5...  Sorry for wasting your time.
